name: Desert Sword
description:
A game developed with the help of my YouTube subscribers. 

The challenge was to create a game using suggestions from subscribers who voted on three game elements: 

1- Game theme (Zelda like) 

2- Weapon (Sword and Pepsi can "Pepsi can was changed eventually :P")

3- Name of the game (Desert Sword) 

Very happy with how it turned out. 

Enjoy your time with this short game.
